para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: A single tool change process involves the operation of many mechanisms in a synchronized sequence. The basic outline of the ATC operation is:

para.text: This is a basic overview of the ATC operation. The actual tool change sequence on the machine may differ based on the options selected.
